gamerule.autoCheckpointEnabled.descripti: Enable or disable automatic checkpoint creation.
gamerule.checkpointFixedInterval.descrip: Number of seconds between each checkpoint.
gamerule.useRandomCheckpointInterval.des: Randomly choose an interval between [Lower Bound] and [Upper Bound] seconds for checkpoints.
gamerule.randomCheckpointLowerBound.desc: The lower bound (in seconds) for the random checkpoint interval.
gamerule.randomCheckpointUpperBound.desc: The upper bound (in seconds) for the random checkpoint interval.
gamerule.fluteCooldownEnabled.descriptio: Enable or disable the cooldown for using the Artifact Flute.
gamerule.fluteCooldownDuration.descripti: Duration in seconds for the Artifact Flute cooldown.
gamerule.artifactFluteEnabled.descriptio: Enable or disable the Artifact Flute feature.

Select the chime sound played on death.
